title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, generating embeddings, and pulling models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: llama-index-integrations/llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embeddings connector for Ollama, enabling RAG pipelines with local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, and RAG with Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Android support and streaming APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama commands with extra utilities like model search and bulk pull.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot frontend that talks to Ollama via REST.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Community project replicating GitHub Copilot experience using Ollama-hosted Code Llama.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Java Swing desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app demonstrating RAG over PDFs using Ollama embeddings and Llama 2.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.
